oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate ten-dollar note
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This Confederate ten-dollar note, issued in Richmond, Va., has an artillery unit as its central image. The lower right image is R. M. T. Hunter, former Confederate Secretary of State. It bears the words "This is not valid until two years after the treaty of peace." This note was found in the Morrell family Bible in Jonesborough, Tennessee.
